title: Disconnection preventing playing the game
body: It seems like every other game after 6.15 hit I have my game will take an enormously long time to load and then my team will have remade the game and I end up with a leaverbuster queue.  I'm running league on a late 2008 MacBook and its run just fine for over 6 months now. This has really iterated me as I feel that Riot doesn't fully support Macs.

replies.body:
We do fully support Macs! The Mac client is infinitely more sensitive to unstable connections, though, so the guide that *Rineyy* linked is a good place to start troubleshooting this issue.

If you continue to have this issue after taking the steps in that guide, please let me know.

This happens when your network fails to establish a stable connection with the game servers. 

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
